organizations.name: Kogan & Kolesnik
quotes: Kogan & Kolesnik is a boutique advisory firm led by Marina Kolesnik and Tim Kogan — two seasoned industry experts with decades of experience in corporate strategy, M&A, and growth leadership.

organizations.name: DataArt
quotes: Notably, as one of the leaders of DataArt’s recent acquisition of ACL in Chile, Marina played a pivotal role in expanding DataArt’s capabilities across Latin America.

organizations.name: Hopper
quotes: Previously, Marina played a key role in launching Hopper’s hotel business.

organizations.name: Travel.ru (Oktogo Group)
quotes: As CEO of Travel.ru (Oktogo Group), she raised $25 million and earned it a place among Fast Company’s Top 50.

organizations.name: Techstars
quotes: Her experience as a mentor at Techstars and a consultant at McKinsey & Company further enriches her perspective and leadership.

organizations.name: TK&C
quotes: In his tenure as Managing Partner at TK&C, Director of Investment Banking at FinPoint — an associate company of Rothschild & Co.— and Capital Times, emerging Europe's leading financial advisory firms, Tim architectured cross-border projects valued at nearly $1 billion and completed M&A and debt restructuring deals worth over $100 million.
